casebody.data:
North Carolina Department of Transportation
v.
Mission Battleground Park, DST ; Mission Battleground Park Leaseco, LLC, Lessee; LaSalle Bank National Association, as Trustee for the Registered Holders of CD 2006-CD3 Commercial Mortgage Pass-Through Certificates; and LAT Battleground Park, LLC No. 361PA16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2017 Bruce P. Ashley, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, Matthew Nis Leerberg, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Patrick M. Kane, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Mission Battleground Park, DST, et al. Hilda Burnett-Baker, Special Deputy Attorney General, Phyllis A. Turner, Assistant Attorney General, for NC Department of Transportation. Patrick M. Kane, Greensboro.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 29th of September 2016 by Defendants in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of January 2017."

Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 15(g)(2).
